Articles.Content:
Hey there guys,

It's been a while, but i recently did a little tutorial series of the career mode in 1.0 and following. Of course, it's in my native language german ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

This may help you out sometimes.

Playlist:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLFgL-kv6F51aq2SaLfcoctgaxbk4SRAX4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The fourth episode is kinda special, because the general topic isn't the career itself, but how orbits work and how you set maneuver nodes and use them :-)

Maneuvers, Orbits and Stuff:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLFgL-kv6F51aq2SaLfcoctgaxbk4SRAX4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLFgL-kv6F51aq2SaLfcoctgaxbk4SRAX4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Feel free to comment and if you have any questions, suggestions or anything else, do what you usually do!

Greetings from Germany,

Karosieben
